summary.span: 为一组命令或控件提供容器。

span.span: Provides a container for a group of commands or controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供一种溢出机制将放置在无法容纳的项到溢出区域。 controls provide an overflow mechanism that places items that do not fit on the into an overflow area. 仅在父级中的工具栏元素可以移动或由用户调整大小。Only toolbar elements within a parent can be moved or resized by the user. 是，这意味着其标头和对象的集合可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## 自定义工具栏控件Customizing the ToolBar Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[ToolBar 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToolBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建内。The following example shows how to create a inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)]

span.span: WPF Controls Gallery Sample

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Band { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Band : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏应位于 中的什么位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where the toolbar should be located in the .
The band of the in which the toolbar is positioned.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位置中的值取决于， ，和属性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 当设置为，带区表示中的行。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 当是，带区表示的列。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之间的关系， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|带区Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|表示在其中一行定位。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 具有工具栏设置为较小的值是上述具有更大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具栏左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指示在其中的列定位。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 具有工具栏左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具栏设置为较小的值是上述具有更大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性将控件内。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#2)]

value.span: 工具栏在 的带区上的位置。

span.span: The position of a toolbar on the band of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未显式设置此属性，其值由依据的顺序中设置。If you do not explicitly set this property, its value is determined by the order in which the is set in the . 例如，如果两个工具栏放入而无需设置并属性、 的值将为 0，这两个工具栏。For example, if you put two toolbars in a without setting the and properties, the value of will be 0 for both toolbars. 值将为 0 表示第一个工具栏，1 表示第二个工具栏。The value of will be 0 for the first toolbar and 1 for the second toolbar. 位置中的值取决于， ，和属性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 当设置为，带区表示中的行。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 当是，带区表示的列。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之间的关系， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|带区Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|表示在其中一行定位。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 具有工具栏设置为较小的值是上述具有更大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具栏左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指示在其中的列定位。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 具有工具栏左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具栏设置为较小的值是上述具有更大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性将控件内。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示工具栏上是否有不可见的项。

value.span: 如果工具栏上具有不可见的项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there are items on the toolbar that are not visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有更多的项比想像得要显示的空间，它将其余项放在其溢出区域。If a has more items than it has the space to show, it puts the remaining items in its overflow area. 用户可以单击箭头访问溢出项。The user can click the arrow on the to access the overflow items. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是只读的附加的属性。This property is a read-only attached property. 只读附加的属性并不常见，并且不能直接[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况。Read-only attached properties are uncommon, and have no direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage. 但是，可以为一种样式中的属性触发器使用附加的属性引用，若要将不同的样式值应用于溢出面板中的工具栏中的项。However, you can use the attached property reference as a property trigger in a style, to apply different style values to an item within a toolbar that is in the overflow panel. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: 为在 上的某个项上按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a key is pressed on an item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户开始，按中的第一项接收键盘焦点。When the user presses HOME, the first item in the receives keyboard focus. 当用户按结束时中的最后一项接收键盘焦点。When the user presses END, the last item in the receives keyboard focus. 此操作时，此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据`true`。When this occurs, this implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

para.span: 如果重写，均应调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 无法调用基实现可防止基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以调用基实现之前或之后应用特殊处理，具体取决于您的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: 为 丢失鼠标捕获时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现不会更改处理的状态 (属性) 的事件数据。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果重写，均应调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 无法调用基实现可防止基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以调用基实现之前或之后应用特殊处理，具体取决于您的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
